description:
It’s school field trip time, which means the girls talk about guys, the guys talk about girls, and they both try desperately to summon the courage to actually talk to each other!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Evvai! Siamo in Gita Scolastica! Non riusciremo a stare da soli...- Yamada, io ti a... Un Sacco di Storie, Un Viaggio Eccitante
Waai! Shuugakuryokou Da! Futarikkiri ni Narenakute ... / Ore, Yamada no Koto ga, Su ... Suttamonda no Chindouchuu
Yay! It`s a School Trip! No Chance to Be Alone... - I Have to Tell You That I L... The Trip Causes a Great Fuss!
わーい, 修学旅行だ! 二人っきりになれなくて... / 俺, 山田のことが, す...すったもんだの珍道中
